categories: Category:Cut content from Star Wars drafts

nodes.text: Yonnas were a species famed for their dancing. They were a feature of expensive entertainment.
Threepio sarcastically refers to dancing Yonnas being part of the package when criticising the cost of hiring Han Solo to get Luke Starkiller and the droids to Ogana Major.
It is possible, but improbable, that Yonnas were non-sentient, as it is possible to train animals to dance. The context is ambigious.
